# Who is Bear

![Bear](IMG_5800.JPG)
![Bear](IMG_5798.PNG)
![Bear](IMG_5797.PNG)

Bear is a 10 years old doxie, he:

- Loves food
- Enjoys laser point chasing game
- Sleeps a lot!
- Has bad teeth, and bad breath due to bad genetics
- Adopted by human Rita three years ago in a animal shelter in Boone, IA.
